com.tencent.tcr.sdk.api

Interface GamePad


  • public interface GamePad
    Cloud controller interaction APIs

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connect()
      Connect the controller.
      void disconnect()
      Disconnect the controller.
      void onAxis(GamePadKey type, int x, int y)
      Trigger a stick event of the cloud controller.
      void onKey(int keycode, boolean down)
      Trigger a button event of the cloud controller.
      void onTrigger(GamePadKey type, int value, boolean down)
      Trigger an L2 or R2 trigger event of the cloud controller.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        void connect()
        Connect the controller. The controller can be used only after it is connected.

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        Disconnect the controller.

      • onAxis

        void onAxis(GamePadKey type,
            int x,
            int y)
        Trigger a stick event of the cloud controller.
        Parameters:
        type - The stick type. Valid values: `left`: Left stick; `right`: Right stick.
        x - The X coordinate of the stick
        y - The Y coordinate of the stick

      • onKey

        void onKey(int keycode,
           boolean down)
        Trigger a button event of the cloud controller.
        Parameters:
        keycode - The controller keycode, such as `RT`, `RB`, `L3`, and `R3`.
        down - Valid values: `true`: Press; `false`: Release.

      • onTrigger

        void onTrigger(GamePadKey type,
               int value,
               boolean down)
        Trigger an L2 or R2 trigger event of the cloud controller.
        Parameters:
        type - The trigger type. Valid values: `L2`, `R2`.
        value - The value
        down - Valid values: `true`: Press; `false`: Release.
